com.facebook.buck.cxx

Class PrefixMapDebugPathSanitizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.cxx.DebugPathSanitizer
      • com.facebook.buck.cxx.PrefixMapDebugPathSanitizer

  • public class PrefixMapDebugPathSanitizer
extends DebugPathSanitizer
    This sanitizer works by depending on the compiler's -fdebug-prefix-map flag to properly ensure that the output only contains references to the mapped-to paths (i.e. the fake paths).
